Algae supplements: Algae is a rich source of vitamins and minerals, including vitamin A, vitamin C, and iron. It can be consumed in the form of powder or capsules.
Fortified foods: Many foods, such as cereals and dairy products, are fortified with vitamins and minerals. These can be a good source of essential nutrients if all fruits and vegetables disappear.
Meat and poultry: Meat and poultry are also good sources of vitamins and minerals, such as vitamin B12 and iron.
Fish and seafood: Fish and seafood are rich in omega-3 fatty acids and are also good sources of vitamins and minerals, such as vitamin D and calcium.

Vitamin and mineral supplements: If all other sources of vitamins and minerals are unavailable, taking a multivitamin or specific vitamin and mineral supplements can help ensure that you are getting enough of these essential nutrients.
